full_summary:
### Service and Digital Strategic Advisory Services
#### Requirement Identification
Transport Canada is seeking a service provider to support the transformation of its operations as part of a modern digital roadmap. The successful partner will deliver strategic advisory services focused on digital services transformation.

#### Background
Transport Canada is investing in various technologies, including service design, agile and product management methodologies, business intelligence, data analytics, data science, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence. The Digital Services Transformation Office is leading major service modernization initiatives across various modes and business lines.

#### Improvements to be Achieved
The provider will support existing Transport Canada teams and staff in developing and applying a common style guide and design template for guidance documents created within the organization.
